content: At the HIC meeting in Brisbane, it became clear that there's enough people working on FHIR in Melbourne, and enough work going on, to justify a FHIR user group meeting.
we're proposing to hold one monthly, and HISA have offered us free use of the HISA office to meet
The next question is, when to meet... I think that early evening is best, on Monday - Thurs evening. If you're interested, can you indicate here, and indicate what constraints on time there might be
@Andrew Patterson @Andrew Yap @Brett Esler @Jane Gilbert @Brian Postlethwaite @Heather Grain - of interest to you, and can you let anyone else not here know please
Interested, Tue/Thu is soccer nights during winter - but once a month in all likelihood I would be able to miss the odd soccer session
How about the first monday night of the month? (I'm sure I could scare up some participation from work too)
first monday is out for me. 2nd and 4th work
Andwe'd miss Sept due to the International WGM
monday is good for me... any week
Would it be possible to dial in for those of us not in Melbourne?
